entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High plus 1. POP 30%
